# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(paraDIS_database)

INCLUDE(${VISIT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMake/PluginMacros.cmake)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(paraDIS)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
paraDISPluginInfo.C
paraDISCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
paraDISPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
paraDISMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtparaDISFileFormat.C
avtparaDISOptions.C
parallelParaDIS.C
Dumpfile.C
paraDIS_lib/paradis.C
paraDIS_lib/paradis_c_interface.C
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib/debugutil.c
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
paraDISEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtparaDISFileFormat.C
avtparaDISOptions.C
parallelParaDIS.C
Dumpfile.C
paraDIS_lib/paradis.C
paraDIS_lib/paradis_c_interface.C
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib/debugutil.c
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
paraDIS_lib
RC_cpp_lib/RC_c_lib
RC_cpp_lib
${BOOST_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)

ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DRC_CPP_VISIT_BUILD)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IparaDISDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IparaDISDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IparaDISDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MparaDISDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MparaDISDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MparaDISDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MparaDISDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EparaDISDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EparaDISDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EparaDISDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EparaDISDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EparaDISDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EparaDISDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EparaDISDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EparaDISDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases paraDIS ${INSTALLTARGETS})
